text:
*Qwilr is hiring a Content Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Qwilr has a really cool solution that improves docs. It helps folks send way better sales proposals, marketing strategies and pitch decks. They are looking to add a content marketer to the team. This will person will work on strategy with the head of marketing and be tasked with executing the plan.

The company is based in Australia but this role is remote, ideally in the US or Canada. Make sure to watch the interview with head of marketing Chris and founder Mark. 


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/25003-content-marketing-manager-qwilr>
